attributes.action: maintain the UK nuclear deterrent by replacing Trident.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current geopolitical situation requires the UK to maintain and when possible improve the countries defence.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "maintain the UK nuclear deterrent by replacing Trident."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12085.asp

Prime Minister's Office
